    • Method Detail

      • getSecurityCheck

        public static ISecurityCheck getSecurityCheck(org.apache.wicket.Component component)
        The security check placed on the component or null. This uses the metadata of a component to store or retrieve the ISecurityCheck.
        Parameters:
        component - if null, null will be returned
        Returns:
        the security check or null if none was placed on the component

      • setSecurityCheck

        public static org.apache.wicket.Component setSecurityCheck(org.apache.wicket.Component component,
                                           ISecurityCheck securityCheck)
        Places a security check on a component. This uses the metadata of a component to store or retrieve the ISecurityCheck.
        Parameters:
        component -
        securityCheck -
        Returns:
        the component or null if the component was null to begin with.

      • hasSecureModel

        public static boolean hasSecureModel(org.apache.wicket.Component component)
        Checks if the component has a ISecureModel.
        Parameters:
        component -
        Returns:
        true if the component has a securemodel, else false.

      • isActionAuthorized

        public static boolean isActionAuthorized(org.apache.wicket.Component component,
                         String action)
        Default implementation for ISecureComponent.isActionAuthorized(String) and WaspAuthorizationStrategy.isActionAuthorized(Component, org.apache.wicket.authorization.Action) . First tries to use the ISecurityCheck from the component if that is not available it tries the ISecureModel if neither is present the action is authorized on the component.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to check
        action - the required action(s)
        Returns:
        true, if the component is authorized, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        ISecureComponent.isActionAuthorized(String), ISecurityCheck, ISecureModel

      • isActionAuthorized

        public static boolean isActionAuthorized(org.apache.wicket.Component component,
                         WaspAction action)
        Default implementation for ISecureComponent.isActionAuthorized(WaspAction) and WaspAuthorizationStrategy.isActionAuthorized(Component, org.apache.wicket.authorization.Action) . First tries to use the ISecurityCheck from the component if that is not available it tries the ISecureModel if neither is present the action is authorized on the component.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to check
        action - the required action(s)
        Returns:
        true, if the component is authorized, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        ISecureComponent.isActionAuthorized(WaspAction), ISecurityCheck, ISecureModel

      • isAuthenticated

        public static boolean isAuthenticated(org.apache.wicket.Component component)
        Default implementation for ISecureComponent.isAuthenticated(). First tries to use the ISecurityCheck from the component if that is not available it tries the ISecureModel if neither is present the user is authenticated if WaspAuthorizationStrategy.isUserAuthenticated() returns true.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to check
        Returns:
        true, if the user is authenticated, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        ISecureComponent.isAuthenticated(), ISecurityCheck, ISecureModel

      • alias

        public static String alias(org.apache.wicket.Component component)
        Builds a 'unique' name for the component. The name is based on the page class alias and the relative path to the page (if not a page itself). Note that although it is unlikely, it is not impossible for two components to have the same alias.
        Parameters:
        component -
        Returns:
        an alias.
        Throws:
        SecurityException - if the component is null, or if the page of the component is not available.

      • alias

        public static String alias(Class<?> class1)
        Builds an alias for a class.
        Parameters:
        class1 -
        Returns:
        an alias

        Returns:
        an alias

      • containerAliasses

        public static String[] containerAliasses(org.apache.wicket.Component component)
        Builds a set of aliases for this component. Each alias can be used as name in Permission.
        Parameters:
        component -
        Returns:
        an array with aliases for this component
